content:
Protocol example: set online status

    PROPPATCH /users/bruceb/ HTTP/1.1


    Host: im.acmewidgets.com

    From: http://im.acmewidgets.com/users/bruceb/

    Man: http://extensions.iana.org/http/rvp/0/8/

    Content-Type: text/xml

    Content-Length: xxxx

    <?xml version="1.0"?><?xml:namespace ns="DAV:" prefix="D"?>

    <?xml:namespace ns="http://www.microsoft.com/protocol_schemas/rvp/" prefix="Z" ?>

    <D:propertyupdate>

    <D:set>

    <D:prop>

    <Z:online-status>

      <Z:leased-value>

      <Z:value>online</Z:value>
      <Z:default-value>offline</Z:default-value>
      <Z:timeout</Z:timeout>
      </Z:leased-value>

    </Z:online-status>

    </D:prop>

    </D:set>

    </D:propertyupdate>
